antivirus.v: Slot
System lock.
Password protects access to the current folder.
Inflicts damage when you leave the folder.
Inflicts damage if you deploy a virus when you remain in the same folder.
Limits use of scanners.
Inflicts damage when you wipe a file (any file).
Prevents leaving the current folder.
Blocks copying and extraction of files.
Protects simple files (documents, libraries, data, ...) against all damage.
Protects CONTROL files against all forms of corruption.
Inflicts heavy damage if you delete a CORE, GUARDIAN or CONTROL file. Blocks reboots.
Inflicts light damage every time you access or leave a folder.
Hides filenames in this folder and all sub-folders.
Absorbs some of the damage done to files.
Inflicts heavy damage every time you access or leave a folder.
Disconnects tyou from the system if it detects damage in the folder it is protecting.
Inflicts damage when a certina number of viruses are deployed on this system.
Inflicts light damage when you inflict damage on another file.
Increases damage inflicted by all anti-virus programmes present on the system.
